abstract: Transportation Security Admin leader Peter V Neffenger announces plan to shore up airport security; says thousands of screeners will be retrained to better detect weapons and other illegal items; promises greater oversight of security badges and notes use of managed inclusion programs will be scaled back.
lead_paragraph: The new leader of the agency said it would retrain thousands of screeners to better detect weapons and also focus on oversight of security badges.

headline.main: After Lapses, T.S.A. Will Target Screening in Overhaul
